name: Gmail 2 highlighted rows - Default Theme
description:
This style highlights the rows and menus in Gmail when you hover over them.

Colors are customized for the "Default" Theme of GMail.

If you are using a different theme, you may want to check the following styles:
- "Classic" Theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/6897
- "Tree" Theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/12304

I would like to credit this theme (http://userstyles.org/styles/678) for the inspiration.

Check also this other theme (http://userstyles.org/styles/6896) if you want all google site to be displayed in Segoe UI.

History:
- 4 March 2009: updated for new Gmail CSS
